name: updateOracleDbV1
description: Updates the properties of a specified Oracle database object.

id.description: ID of an Oracle database object.

body.description: Properties of the Oracle database object to be updated. object.

$ul: **configuredSlaDomainId**: The ID of the SLA Domain configured directly on the Rubrik object.
**configuredSlaDomainName**: The name of the SLA Domain configured directly on the Rubrik object.
**configuredSlaDomainType**: Specifies whether the SLA Domain is used for protection or retention.
**id**: ID assigned to the Oracle database.
**isConfiguredSlaDomainRetentionLocked**: Indicates whether the configured SLA Domain is Retention Locked. When this value is 'true', the configured SLA Domain is a Retention Lock SLA Domain.
**name**: Service name of the Oracle database.
**primaryClusterId**
**slaLastUpdateTime**: The UTC time when the SLA Domain was last updated.
**effectiveSlaDomainId**: The ID of the SLA Domain that controls the protection of the Rubrik object.
**effectiveSlaDomainName**: The name of the SLA Domain that controls the protection of the Rubrik object.
**effectiveSlaDomainPolarisManagedId**: Optional. This field contains the managed ID of of the Polaris-managed effective SLA Domain.
**effectiveSlaSourceObjectId**: The ID of the parent of the Rubrik object from which the SLA Domain that controls the protection of Rubrik object is inherited.
**effectiveSlaSourceObjectName**: The name of the parent of the Rubrik object from which the SLA Domain that controls the protection of Rubrik object is inherited.
**isEffectiveSlaDomainRetentionLocked**: Indicates whether the effective SLA Domain is Retention Locked. When this value is 'true', the effective SLA domain is a Retention Lock SLA Domain.
**retentionSlaDomainId**: The ID of the SLA Domain whose retention policy is in use.

**slaAssignment**: The SLA assignment type. Direct SLA assignment means that a SLA Domain was configured directly on the Rubrik object by the user. Derived SLA assignment means that the Rubrik object inherits an SLA Domain from its parent Rubrik object.
**archiveLogDestinations**: An array that contains the archive log destinations for the specified Oracle database.
**currentBackupTaskInfo**
**expectedEndTime**: The expected completion time of the task.
**queueTime**: The scheduled start time of the task.
**taskStatus**: Status of the task.
**dataGuardGroupId**: Rubrik ID of the Data Guard group to which this database belongs.
**dataGuardGroupMembers**: List of Data Guard group members.
**dataGuardGroupName**: Name of the Data Guard group to which this database belongs.
**dataGuardType**: Specifies whether this database is a Data Guard member, Data Guard group, or a non-Data Guard database.
**databaseRole**: Current role of the database.
**dbUniqueName**: Unique name for the Oracle database (DB_UNIQUE_NAME).

**hostLogRetentionHours**: Specifies an interval in hours. The next log snapshot job deletes archived Oracle redo log files whose 'nextTime' field specifies a time more than the specified number of hours ago. To immediately delete archived redo log files regardless of age, specify an interval of -1. To preserve all archived redo log files, specify an interval of -2.
**includeBackupTaskInfo**: True/false value indicating if backup task information is included in the response.
**infraPath**: An array that contains information about the objects in the infrastructure path of a specified Oracle database.
**instances**: Details of the instances of the Oracle database.
**isArchiveLogModeEnabled**: Boolean value that indicates whether the ARCHIVELOG mode is enabled on the Oracle database or not.
**isDbLocalToTheCluster**: A Boolean value that specifies whether the Oracle database is local to the cluster. When this value is 'true', the Oracle database is local to the cluster.
**isPrimary**: Indicates whether the current DATABASE_ROLE is PRIMARY which specifies the database is accepting read/write transactions as the primary database in a Data Guard configuration.
**isRelic**: Boolean value that indicates whether a Oracle database object is in an archived state and has retained snapshots. Value is true when the object is archived with retained snapshots.
**lastSnapshotTime**: The timestamp of the previous snapshot.
**logBackupFrequencyInMinutes**: Specifies an interval in minutes. This interval is the period between successive log backups.
**numInstances**: Count of the number of instances of the Oracle database.
**numMissedSnapshot**: An integer that specifies the number of missed snapshots.
**numTablespaces**: Count of the number of table spaces in Oracle database.
**racId**: Rubrik ID of the RAC on which this database is hosted. This field will be empty if the database is not hosted on a RAC environment.
**racName**: RAC name of the cluster database.
**sid**: System identifier (SID) of the Oracle database.
**standaloneHostId**: Rubrik ID of the standalone Oracle host on which this database is hosted. This field will be empty if the database is not hosted on a standalone system.
**standaloneHostName**: Hostname of the standalone Oracle database host.
**hostMount**: Path where the NFS share is mounted on the host.
**logRetentionHours**: Specifies an interval in hours. Log backups are retained for the duration of the interval.
**numChannels**: Number of channels used to backup the Oracle database.
**hostsInfo**: An array that contains the host info for each instance.
**isLiveMount**: Value that indicates whether an Oracle database object is a Live Mount or not. A true value indicates that the object is a Live Mount.
**lastValidationResult**
**eventSeriesId**: The eventseries ID for the last validation job.
**isSuccess**: A Boolean that specifies whether the last validation successfully completed.
**validationTime**: The timestamp of the recovery point to validate.
**latestRecoveryPoint**: The time stamp of the most recent recovery point for this database.
**oldestRecoveryPoint**: The time stamp of the earliest recovery point for this database.
**oracleHome**: Oracle Home of the Oracle database.
**pendingSlaDomain**
**isPendingSlaDomainRetentionLocked**
**objectId**: Managed ID of the object.
**pendingSlaDomainId**
**pendingSlaDomainName**
**preferredDGMemberUniqueNames**: Ordered list of database unique names to use for backup in a Data Guard group.
**shouldBackupFromPrimaryDGGroupMemberOnly**: Indicates whether to backup only from the PRIMARY Data Guard member or from any available member.
**snapshotCount**
**tablespaces**: An array that contains tablespace names of the specified Oracle database.
